card.name: Orflaith's Solemn Oath
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, you may tap two untapped legendary permanents you control. If you do, Orflaith's Solemn Oath is fulfilled. When Orflaith's Solemn Oath is fulfilled, exile it and destroy target legendary creature, legendary enchantment, or planeswalker.

card.name: Empire's End
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I, II — Exile target artifact or creature. III — Destroy all artifact, creatures, and enchantments. Then return to the battlefield all permanents exiled with Empire's End. ​

card.name: Exterminate
card.text: Exile target creature or planeswalker.

card.name: Shilok, Lord of Blackwater
card.text: [+1]: Put a +1/+1 counter and a haste counter on up to one target creature you control. [-2]: Modified creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.) [-6]: You get an emblem with "Whenever a creature you control dies, if it had counters on it, create a token that's a copy of it."

card.name: Subjugate
card.text: Exile target planeswalker. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as that planeswalker and exile them. Then that player shuffles.

card.name: Depths of Tytheus
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I, II — Target player mills five cards, then exiles their graveyard. III — Create a green and blue Elder Horror creature token with "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards each player owns in exile." ​

card.name: Search for Fire
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I, II — You may discard a card. If you do, draw a card. III — Search your library for an artifact card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. If it was an Equipment card, you may attach it to target creature you control. ​

card.name: Dreams of Quyrash
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I, II — Spells you cast cost {1} less to cast until the end of your next turn. III — Until end of turn, whenever you a cast a spell, create a token that's a copy of target nonland permanent, except it's an enchantment in addition to its other types. ​

card.name: Skies Over San Xalco
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I, II — Each player discards a card. III — You may reveal a creature card with mana value 6 or less you own from outside the game and put it onto the battlefield. ​

card.name: Sabotage
card.text: Exile target artifact.

card.name: Morstad Watcher
card.text: Modular 1 (This creature enters with a +1/+1 counter on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.) {T}: Add {C}.

card.text: ({P} can be paid with either {1} or 2 life.) Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

card.name: Grafted Carapace
card.text: Equipped creature has base power and toughness 4/4. Equip {2}

card.name: Petrified Idol
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}, Sacrifice Petrified Idol: Return target land card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Cult Chalice
card.text: {T}: Scry 1. Put a blood counter on Cult Chalice. {T}, Remove a blood counter from Cult Chalice: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Firebrand Heretic
card.text: Firebrand Heretic can't block and can't be blocked.

card.name: Relentless Pursuer
card.text: Relentless Pursuer has deathtouch as long as it's modified. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)

card.name: Yog's Avenger
card.text: When Yog's Avenger dies, put a -1/-1 counter on up to one target creature.

card.name: Sin-Clad Wight
card.text: When Sin-Clad Wight enters the battlefield, you may return an artifact card from your graveyard to your hand. If you don't, put a menace counter on Sin-Clad Wight.

card.name: Dakhazi Legion
card.text: Dakhazi Legion's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Skeletons you control plus the number of Skeleton cards in your graveyard.

card.name: Shadow of the Piper
card.text: When Shadow of the Piper enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or enchantment card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: Curious Starplucker
card.text: When Curious Starplucker enters the battlefield, draw two cards, then discard two cards. Evoke {1}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters.)

card.name: Ogre Executioner
card.text: As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Ogre Executioner has menace.

card.name: Wrathful Sinner
card.text: As long as Wrathful Sinner is modified, it has undying. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications. When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)

card.name: Necromancer's Opus
card.text: Sacrifice three Skeletons: Return Necromancer's Opus from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Lursk's Dirge
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -3/-3. Abstraction {1}{B} ({1}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Draw a card. Activate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Dreams from Outer Spheres
card.text: Enchanted creature gets -2/-2. Unearth {3}{B} ({3}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Exile it at the beginning of the end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Cage of Ribs
card.text: Target player sacrifices a creature. If that player does, they create a 1/1 blue Bird creature token with flying.

card.name: Offering to Sotak
card.text: Destroy target non-Ogre, non-Demon creature.

card.name: Wisdom of Sotak
card.text: You draw two cards, lose 2 life, and get two poison counters. (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)

card.name: Beneath the Surface
card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. If that card's mana value is 2 or less, you may put it onto the battlefield tapped instead.

card.name: Carriage's Wail
card.text: Target opponent discards two cards. If fewer than two cards were discarded this way, that player loses 3 life.

card.name: Fade into Gloom
card.text: Target creature gets -2/-2 and gains indestructible until end of turn. If you control that creature, draw a card.

card.name: Tear Apart
card.text: Choose one — • Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {3}. • Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.

card.text: {2}{G}, Exile Shambling Sporocarp from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's 3/3.

card.name: Kuzam Chieftan
card.text: Resilience (This creature can't block unless it has a counter on it. When it dies, if it had no counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a vigilance counter on it.)

card.name: Scarwood Dryad
card.text: Discard a card: Scarwood Dryad gains your choice of deathtouch or lifelink until end of turn.

card.name: Sabretooth Ambusher
card.text: You may cast Sabretooth Ambusher as though it had flash as long as a Human entered the battlefield or attacked this turn.

card.text: Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has haste and trample.

card.name: Weepwood Recluse

card.text: When Artificial Exemplar enters the battlefield, create a 0/0 Construct artifact creature token, then distribute four +1/+1 counters among creatures you control.

card.name: Weepwood Mycoloth
card.text: Human offering (You may cast this spell as though it had flash by sacrificing a Human and paying the difference in mana costs between this and the sacrificed Human. Mana cost includes color.)

card.text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to any target.

card.text: Mill three cards, then target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of card types among cards in your graveyard.

card.text: Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of card types among cards in your graveyard. You may reveal a creature or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Savage Apothecary
card.text: Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters with a +1/+1 counter on it.) Modified creatures you control have haste. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)

card.name: Engine of Damnation
card.text: Trample Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Herald of Sotak
card.text: This spell costs {R} less to cast for each source you control that has dealt damage this turn. Haste

card.name: Walking Wick
card.text: When Walking Wick dies, if it was attacking, choose up to one target permanent. Double the number of each kind of counter on that permanent.

card.name: Smokestack Hellkite
card.text: As long as Smokestack Hellkite is a creature, it has flying and haste and is a Dragon in addition to its other types. Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Fruity Tang
card.text: Fruity Tang deals 3 damage to any target. Formidable — If creatures you control have total power 8 or greater, Fruity Tang deals an additional 1 damage to each creature and each planeswalker your opponents control.

card.name: Legion Deployment
card.text: Choose two. You may choose the same mode more than once. • Legion Deployment deals 1 damage to each creature. • Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.

card.name: Grapes of Wrath
card.text: Choose one — • Target creature fights another target creature. • Target creature deals damage equal to its power to target player.

card.name: Chromatic Expanse
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}: Add two mana of different colors. Spend this mana only to cast a spell that's two or fewer colors.

card.name: Testudo Formation
card.text: As long as there are three or more kinds of counter among permanents you control, attacking creatures you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Warp Drive
card.text: Choose an instant or sorcery card in a graveyard. You may cast it this turn. If that spell would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.

card.name: Jystani Gemdreamer
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell from exile, put a +1/+1 counter on Jystani Gemdreamer.

card.name: Reaver of Bocacius
card.text: When Reaver of Bocacius dies, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card. Madness {1}{U} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Indolent Outsider
card.text: Defender When Indolent Outsider enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal an enchantment card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Dakhazi Charioteer
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, up to one target Vehicle you control becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.

card.name: Forging the Tyrant
card.text: Create a 0/0 Construct artifact creature token, then put a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to the number of cards in your graveyard. Retrace (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)

card.name: Guilt's Visage
card.text: Guilt's Visage's toughness is equal to the number of cards in your graveyard.

card.name: Dreambound Scuttler
card.text: Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, target player mills three cards.

card.name: Graven Meditation
card.text: Draw a card. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Refusal of the Ancients
card.text: Counter target spell if mana from a nonland source was spent to cast it.

card.name: Somber Tutelage
card.text: When Somber Tutelage enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card. Whenever you discard a card, each opponent mills two cards.

card.name: Pupate
card.text: Enchant artifact or creature Enchanted permanent loses all other types and is a 3/3 Insect creature with flying.

card.name: Touch the Light
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each enchantment you control. As long as you control three or more enchantments, enchanted creature can't be blocked.

card.name: Winding Compass
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}: You may cast creature spells this turn as though they had flash.

card.name: Life's Echo
card.text: Vigilance Life's Echo's power and toughness are each equal to your life total minus your starting life total.

card.name: Luminous Martyr
card.text: Fateful hour — As long as you have 5 or less life, Luminous Martyr gets +2/+2 and has lifelink.

card.name: Girded Fetch
card.text: When Girded Fetch enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Equipment or Vehicle card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Abyssal Predator
card.text: Abyssal Predator enters the battlefield tapped with a stun counter on it. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)

card.name: Herald of the Damned
card.text: If your life total is less than or greater than your starting life total, this spell costs {X} less to cast, where X is the difference. Vigilance, flying, lifelink

card.name: Shockodile
card.text: When Shockodile enters the battlefield, choose up to one target nonland permanent you don't control with mana value less than or equal to the amount of mana spent to cast Shockodile. Exile that permanent until Shockodile leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Iron Maw
card.text: As long as Iron Maw is in your library, it's a basic Mountain land in addition to its other types. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Iron Maw: Target player shuffles up to three target cards from their graveyard into their library.

card.name: Only in Death Does Duty End
card.text: Destroy target tapped creature. Create a 1/1 black Skeleton creature token.

card.name: Empty Rift
card.text: When Empty Rift enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls with mana value 2 or less until Empty Rift leaves the battlefield.

card.name: An-Drim Fleet
card.text: Lifelink At the beginning of your end step, if you gained 4 or more life this turn, create a 2/2 white Warrior creature token. Crew 4 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 4 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Skyside Voyager
card.text: As long as Skyside Voyager is a creature, creature spells you cast cost {W} less to cast. Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Sequester
card.text: Counter target spell or ability that targets you or a permanent you control.

card.name: Screaming Unlife
card.text: Abilities that would be triggered by a creature you control entering the battlefield also trigger when that creature dies.

card.name: Qirauz, The Prince Who Failed
card.text: Whenever you cast your first spell each turn, create a token that's a copy of Qirauz, The Prince Who Failed, except it's not legendary, it doesn't have this ability, and its starting loyalty is equal to that spell's mana value. [-1]: Draw a card. Put a loyalty counter on each legendary Qirauz planeswalker you control. [-3]: Target permanent's controller exiles it unless they exile two cards from their hand [-8]: Each opponent exiles their hand, then loses 1 life for each card they own in exile.

card.name: Combat Simulacrum
card.text: Training (Whenever this creature attacks with another creature with greater power, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.) Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.) Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by Combat Simulacrum.

card.name: Speaker of Sands
card.text: Flash If an artifact would enter the battlefield and it wasn't cast, exile it instead.

card.name: Turn to Stone
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature is an artifact and loses all other types.

card.name: Chainer's Grave
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. Threshold — {B}{G}: Chainer's Grave becomes a 4/4 black and green Nightmare Horror creature with menace until end of turn. It's still a land. Activate only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: Terminal Marsh
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}: Put a storage counter on Terminal Marsh. {1}, Remove X storage counters from Terminal Marsh: Add X mana in any combination of {G} and/or {U}.

card.name: Daru Verge
card.text: Daru Verge enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Daru Verge: Search your library for a Plains card and a Swamp card, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Drowned Peak
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {U} or {R}. Activate only if you control an Island.

card.name: Highland Pass
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {R} or {W}. Each opponent gains 1 life.

card.name: Inviolable Titan
card.text: Players can't get counters. Counters can't be put on permanents. Players and permanents can't have Auras and Equipment attached to them.

card.name: No Mercy
card.text: Whenever a creature deals damage to you, destroy it.

card.name: Elder Horror MHQ
card.text: This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards each player owns in exile.

card.name: Time's End
card.text: The player whose turn it is may end the turn. If they don't, and if it isn't your turn, you may cast a spell from your hand without paying its mana cost. Exile Time's End.

card.name: Wrath of Qirauz
card.text: Destroy all nonbasic lands.

card.name: Triumph of Qirauz
card.text: Life totals can't change. Whenever a player is dealt damage, that player exiles that many cards from the top of their library.

card.name: Remnants of the Architect
card.text: Search your library for two creature cards with different names, exile them, then shuffle. Target opponent chooses one of the exiled cards. Put the chosen card into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

card.name: Wail of Disintegration
card.text: All creatures get +2/-2 until end of turn.

card.name: Qamesh, Slayer of Worlds
card.text: When Qamesh, Slayer of Worlds enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 black Skeleton creature token for each opponent you have. Sacrifice a Skeleton: Qamesh gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Noncreature spells cost {1} more to cast this turn.

card.name: Touch of Corvash
card.text: Infect (This spell deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) Touch of Corvash deals 4 damage to each creature and each opponent.

card.name: Lursk, Recurring Dream
card.text: [+1]: Create a 1/1 blue Dream creature token, then put a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to the number of tapped creatures on the battlefield. [-2]: Choose target player. Put a stun counter on each creature that player controls, then tap up to two of those creatures. [-8]: You control target player during that player's next turn. Whenever you cast a spell during that turn, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Remnant of Akaddi
card.text: Flying As Remnant of Akaddi enters the battlefield, you may remove any number of counters from permanents you control. Remnant of Akaddi enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each kind of counter removed this way.

card.name: Orflaith, Patient Hunter
card.text: [+2]: Create a 1/1 white Dream enchantment creature token with lifelink. [-X]: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn. Its controller loses X life. [-8]: Exile up to three target permanents. You may reveal an enchantment card you own from outside the game and put it onto the battlefield.

card.text: Lifelink

card.name: Treasure MHQ
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Luuft, Kushabi Exile
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice any number of Bloods. If you do, put that many loyalty counters on Luuft, Kushabi Exile. [0]: Create two Blood tokens. (They're artifacts with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this token: Draw a card.") [-2]: Destroy target artifact, creature, or planeswalker. Create a Blood token. [-5]: Return target permanent card from a graveyard to the battlefield under your control. If you don't own that card, sacrifice it at the beginning of your next end step.

card.name: Leyline of the Beyond
card.text: If Leyline of the Beyond is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield. Whenever a player casts a spell, if no mana was spent to cast it, that player loses life equal to that spell's mana value.

card.name: Unquiet Sanctum
card.text: Each creature card in your graveyard has unearth {X}, where X is that card's mana value. (They have "{X}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Exile it at the beginning of the end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.")

card.name: Tribute to the Lares
card.text: You gain 2 life. Then counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}, where X is the amount of life you've gained this turn.

card.name: Veil-Cutter Ronin
card.text: Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom in a random order.) Dash {2}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

card.name: Carved Sovereign
card.text: Affinity for artifact creatures (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact creature you control.) Each creature you control assigns combat damage equal to its mana value rather than its power.

card.name: Turnip Titan
card.text: Whenever you discard a card, Turnip Titan gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each card type among cards in your graveyard. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Geesh's Blessing
card.text: Populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.) Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

card.name: Troop Morale
card.text: Enchant creature you control with the lowest power Creatures you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Prism MHQ
card.text: Menace This creature is all colors.

card.name: Amphibious Transport
card.text: Amphibious Transport enters the battlefield with twice X +1/+1 counters on it. Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Kavu Tyrant
card.text: Kavu Tyrant's power and toughness are each equal to the number of land types among lands you control. (Land types include the basic land types, Gate, Lair, Sphere, and others.) When Kavu Tyrant enters the battlefield or attacks, you may return target land card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Sinister Lurker
card.text: Ward—Tap two untapped creatures you control Sinister Lurker gets +2/+2 as long as any graveyard has seven or more cards in it.

card.name: Ambulatory Vat
card.text: Flash When Ambulatory Vat enters the battlefield, exile target creature spell. When you do, Ambulatory Vat's power and toughness become equal to the power and toughness of that card. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

card.name: Borrowed Breath
card.text: You can't lose the game this turn and your opponents can't win the game this turn. Your life total becomes equal to your starting life total. For each 1 life you gained this way, exile the top card of your library.

card.name: Ar Dacha Storyteller
card.text: As long as you have seven or more cards in hand, you may pay {0} rather than pay cycling costs. Cycling {U} ({U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Die Laughing
card.text: Kicker {2}{U}{U} (You may pay an additional {2}{U}{U} as you cast this spell.) Enchant creature When Die Laughing enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, gain control of enchanted creature. When enchanted creature dies, create a token that's a copy of it.

card.name: Yog's Favored
card.text: As Yog's Favored enters the battlefield, choose target opponent. If that player has more cards in hand than you, Yog's Favored enters the battlefield with a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to the difference.

card.name: Shifting Moon
card.text: Nonbasic lands have "When this land enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you pay {1}."

card.name: Wrath of the First Ones
card.text: Choose one. If X is 5 or more, choose both instead. • Destroy each creature with power X or less. • Create X 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.

card.name: Monkey Business
card.text: Enchant nonland permanent Enchanted permanent loses all abilities and is a green Ape creature with base power and toughness 2/2.

card.name: Inexorable Legion
card.text: When Inexorable Legion enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 black Skeleton creature token. Inexorable Legion gets +1/+1 for each other Skeleton you control. Undying (When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)

card.name: Warshifter
card.text: As long as an opponent has been dealt 3 or more noncombat damage this turn by sources you control, Warshifter is a 4/3 Minotaur Warrior with menace.

card.name: Chosen of Corvash
card.text: Ward—Gain ten poison counters Whenever Chosen of Corvash blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, that creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Heart of Flame
card.text: Heart of Flame deals 3 damage to any target. If a creature or planeswalker is dealt excess damage this way, exile that many cards from the top of your library. Until end of turn, you may play those cards.

card.name: Mana Refraction
card.text: Whenever you tap a land for mana, add an additional mana of another color.

card.name: Unquiet Clearing
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add {U} or {B}. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Unquiet Clearing: Draw a card.

card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add {W} or {U}. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Gathering Squall: Draw a card.

card.text: Whenever Serpent Engine becomes crewed for the first time each turn, if it was crewed by exactly one creature, it gains lifelink, flying, and trample until end of turn. card.text: Equipped creature has "{T}: Add {C}{C}." Equip {1}

card.name: Alchemical Discovery
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, remove X counters from permanents you control. Draw X cards.

card.name: Sparkmage's Charm
card.text: Choose one — • Sparkmage's Charm deals 4 damage to any target. • Destroy target nonbasic land. • Discard your hand, then draw three cards.

card.name: Mulchtiller Wurm
card.text: Activated abilities of lands can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.

card.name: Cemetary Seraph
card.text: Flying Whenever one or more cards leave a graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on Cemetary Seraph and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Elemental Emergence
card.text: Elemental Emergence is all colors. Exile target permanent you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Terrify
card.text: Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. A creature destroyed this way can't be regenerated. Overload {3}{B}{B}{B} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")

card.name: Issa, Gatherer of the Lost
card.text: When Issa, Gatherer of the Lost enters the battlefield, if {U} to spent to cast it, search your library for a blue legendary card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. The same is true for {B} and black, {R} and red, and {G} and green. Then shuffle. Issa gets +1/+1 for each other legendary creature you control.

card.name: Cease Hostility
card.text: Instill (You can dream this spell into being. Each creature you tap as you cast this spell pays for {1}, plus {1} for each Aura attached to that creature.) Exile target nonland permanent with mana value X or less.

card.name: Alluring Lotus
card.text: Morph {2} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) {T}, Sacrifice Alluring Lotus: Add three mana of any one color.

card.name: Warwake Phoenix
card.text: Flying, haste When Warwake Phoenix dies, you may exile it and exile an Equipment card from your hand or graveyard. If you do, at the beginning of your next upkeep, return both of those cards to the battlefield and attach that Equipment to Warwake Phoenix.

card.name: Unell's Champion
card.text: If you tap a permanent for mana, it produces four times as much of that mana instead.

card.name: Interplanar Nexus
card.text: Exile the top six cards of target player's library. You may cast any number of spells from among the exiled cards with total mana value 6 or less without paying their mana costs. Repeat this process for each other player's library.

card.name: Pink Slime
card.text: Foods you control are 1/1 Germ creatures in addition to their other types. Germs you control are Food artifacts in addition to their other types and have "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life."

card.name: Collected Covenant
card.text: Return up to two target creature cards each with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Immolating Hellkite
card.text: Flying When Immolating Hellkite enters the battlefield, destroy target land that could produce {C}. Immolating Hellkite gets +1/+0 for each land card in all graveyards.

card.name: Eternity's Gate
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add one mana of any color among cards you own in exile.

card.name: Stoic Philosopher
card.text: You don't lose the game for having 0 or less life, for having ten or more poison counters, or for drawing a card while you have no cards in your library.

card.name: Mox Paradox
card.text: When Mox Paradox enters the battlefield, choose two colors. {T}: Add one mana of one of the chosen colors. Spend this mana only to cast a spell that's exactly both of the chosen colors.
